content.en: Control system algorithms: Researchers have developed various algorithms to address different research questions in the field of control systems. These algorithms are designed to optimize the performance of controllers for discrete-time systems, solve problems related to parameter uncertainty, communication constraints, and random delays, and enhance the tracking control and stability of networked control systems. The algorithms employ techniques such as linear matrix inequalities, orthogonal joint diagonalization, Markov processes, Lyapunov-Krasovskii approach, cone complementarity linearization, and quantization methods.
content.da: Styrealgoritmer: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at adressere forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for styresystemer. Disse algoritmer er designet til at optimere ydelsen af controllere for diskrete tidssystemer, løse problemer relateret til parameterusikkerhed, kommunikationsbegrænsninger og tilfældige forsinkelser, samt forbedre sporing og stabilitet af netværksbaserede styresystemer. Algoritmerne anvender teknikker såsom lineære matrixuligheder, ortogonal fællesdiagonalisering, Markov-processer, Lyapunov-Krasovskii-tilgang, konkomplementaritetslinearisering og kvantiseringsmetoder.
